verses.text: \w Come|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, O \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*: \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w delicate|strong="H6028"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w tender|strong="H7390"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* millstone \w and|strong="H3947"\w* \w grind|strong="H2912"\w* \w meal|strong="H7058"\w*: \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* thy shame, \w strip|strong="H1540"\w* thy shoulder, \w make|strong="H1540"\w* \w bare|strong="H1540"\w* thy \w legs|strong="H7785"\w*, \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*.

Thy \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* discovered, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* thy \w shame|strong="H2781"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*: \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w*, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* resist \w me|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Our|strong="H3068"\w* \w redeemer|strong="H1350"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Sit|strong="H3427"\w* thou silent, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w get|strong="H0935"\w* thee \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* lady \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* polluted \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* thy bend: thou hast shewn \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7356"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*: \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ancient thou hast \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5769"\w* thou hast \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* lady \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: thou hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* hast thou \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* thy \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w end|strong="H0319"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8085"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w*, thou \w that|strong="H3045"\w* art delicate, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* dwellest confidently, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* sayest \w in|strong="H3427"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w there|strong="H0657"\w* \w is|strong="H0657"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w else|strong="H5750"\w* \w besides|strong="H5750"\w* \w me|strong="H0589"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w as|strong="H3824"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* barrenness.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w suddenly|strong="H7281"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, barrenness \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w widowhood|strong="H0489"\w*. \w All|strong="H3117"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thy \w sorceries|strong="H3785"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* hardness \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thy enchanters.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* thou best \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H0982"\w* thy \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* hast \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w There|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* seeth \w me|strong="H7725"\w*. Thy \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, \w this|strong="H1931"\w* hath deceived thee. \w And|strong="H7725"\w* thou best \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H0982"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w besides|strong="H5750"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w other|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w Evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w then|strong="H0935"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* rising thereof: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w calamity|strong="H7451"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* violently \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, which thou canst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w keep|strong="H0935"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w*: misery \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w*, which thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w Stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w with|strong="H5975"\w* thy enchanters, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w with|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H7230"\w* thy \w sorceries|strong="H3785"\w*, \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast laboured \w from|strong="H5975"\w* thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w so|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H4994"\w* \w it|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w profit|strong="H3276"\w* thee any \w thing|strong="H4994"\w*, \w or|strong="H3276"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* thou mayst \w become|strong="H3021"\w* stronger.

Thou hast failed \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w or|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w counsels|strong="H6098"\w*: \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* astrologers \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* thee, \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* gazed \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w stars|strong="H3556"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* counted \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w might|strong="H0834"\w* \w tell|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* thee.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w*, \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* hath \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w power|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* dames: \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* wherewith \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w warmed|strong="H2552"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* thereat.

\w Such|strong="H3651"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w things|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thee, \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou best laboured: thy \w merchants|strong="H5503"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* hath erred \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w way|strong="H3651"\w*, \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w can|strong="H0834"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* thee.
